name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-dalle-prompt-generator
title: Dall-E Prompt Generator Prompt
shortDescription: AI Builder prompt that helps with generating refined prompts for Dall-E

metadata.value: Generate a prompt for the DALLÂ·E AI image generation service for this topic [topic]. Provide a creative and detailed description that will inspire interesting images from the AI. Keep in mind that the AI is capable of understanding a wide range of language and can interpret abstract concepts, so feel free to be as imaginative and descriptive as possible. For example, you could describe a scene from a futuristic city, or a surreal landscape filled with strange creatures. The more detailed and imaginative your description, the more interesting the resulting image will be.
